short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a smart amazon rating to search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon adds a smart score to each product on the amazon search page. The score is a weighted utility of the reviews with additive smoothing. This makes the scores much more useful than a simple average
